15632642Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string formatSizeBinary(Int64 size, Int32 decimals, int value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            decimals = value;Di2015NewLine            string[] sizes = { "Bytes", "KB", "MB", "GB", "TB", "PB", "EB", "ZB", "YB" };Di2015NewLine            double formattedSize = size;Di2015NewLine            Int32 sizeIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (formattedSize >= 1024 & sizeIndex < sizes.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                formattedSize /= 1024;Di2015NewLine                sizeIndex += 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("{0} {1}", Math.Round(formattedSize, decimals).ToString(), sizes[sizeIndex]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

15636310Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TSource, TReturn>>Di2015NewLine      Merge<TSource, TSource2, TReturn>(Di2015NewLine  Expression<Func<TSource, TSource2>> foo1,Di2015NewLine  Expression<Func<TSource2, TReturn>> foo2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var swapped = new SwapVisitor(Di2015NewLine        foo2.Parameters.Single(), foo1.Body).Visit(foo2.Body);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, TReturn>>(Di2015NewLine        swapped, foo1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass SwapVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public SwapVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15636318Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Show()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<string> lst = new string[]{"001001009001", "001001009002", Di2015NewLine       "001001009003", "001001009004", "001001009005", "001001010002", Di2015NewLine       "001001010003" };Di2015NewLine    var res = Process(lst);Di2015NewLine    forech(string str in res)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic List<string> Process(IEnumerable<string> input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, int[]> elements = new Dictionary<string,int[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var str in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string element = str.Substring(0, 9);Di2015NewLine        int privelegeNumber = int.Parse(str.Substring(9, 3));Di2015NewLine        if (!elements.ContainsKey(element))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            elements.Add(element, Enumerable.Repeat(0, 5).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elements[element][privelegeNumber - 1] = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var element in elements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(21);Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(element.Key.Substring(0, 3));Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(element.Key.Substring(3, 3));Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(element.Key.Substring(6, 3));Di2015NewLine        foreach (int privelege in element.Value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(privelege);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result.Add(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15650464Di2015UniqueSeparator//Be sure to add this reference:Di2015NewLine//Project>Add Reference>.NET tab>Microsoft.Office.Interop.WordDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//open Word AppDi2015NewLineMicrosoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application msWord = new Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//make it visible or it'll stay running in the backgroundDi2015NewLinemsWord.Visible = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//open a new document based on the Word template.Di2015NewLine//You shouldn't open the template directly using msWord.Documents.Open(path) unless you want to edit the template itself.Di2015NewLineMicrosoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document wordDoc = msWord.Documents.Add(@"c:\\MyTemplate.dotx");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//find the bookmarkDi2015NewLinestring bookmarkName = "BookmarkToFind";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (wordDoc.Bookmarks.Exists(bookmarkName))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmark bk = wordDoc.Bookmarks[bookmarkName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //set the document's range to immediately after the bookmark.Di2015NewLine    //If you want to add the table *into* the bookmark, it needs to be done differently.Di2015NewLine    //This page has a good explanation of the differences between adding to the bookmark's range vs adding after the bookmark's range.Di2015NewLine    //http://gregmaxey.mvps.org/word_tip_pages/insert_text_at_or_in_bookmark.htmlDi2015NewLine    //It's a little more hassle because you have to re-add the bookmark after inserting into it,Di2015NewLine    //so inserting after the bookmark is usually fine less you're going to be inserting text programmatically at the same bookmark a second time.Di2015NewLine    Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range rng = wordDoc.Range(bk.Range.End, bk.Range.End);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create a table with 8 rows and 5 columns into the range.Di2015NewLine    Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Table tbl = wordDoc.Tables.Add(rng, 8, 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //set the table's borders.Di2015NewLine    tbl.Borders.InsideLineStyle = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineStyle.wdLineStyleSingle;Di2015NewLine    tbl.Borders.OutsideLineStyle = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineStyle.wdLineStyleSingle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //merge the cells in the first row down to 2 columns (Word's cells start at 1, not at 0).Di2015NewLine    tbl.Cell(1, 1).Merge(tbl.Cell(1, 3));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //distribute the columns evenlyDi2015NewLine    tbl.Rows[1].Select();Di2015NewLine    msWord.Selection.Cells.DistributeWidth();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //rows 2-5 already have 5 columns so don't touch them.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //merge rows 6-8 into single-columns rows.Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 6; x < 9; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tbl.Cell(x,1).Merge(tbl.Cell(x,5));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //put the cursor in the table's first cell.Di2015NewLine    rng=wordDoc.Range(tbl.Cell(1,1).Range.Start, tbl.Cell(1,1).Range.Start);Di2015NewLine    rng.Select();Di2015NewLine

15654488Di2015UniqueSeparator      public static Color GetShade(Color start, Color end, byte intervals, byte index)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var deltaR = end.R - start.R;Di2015NewLine        var deltaG = end.G - start.G;Di2015NewLine        var deltaB = end.B - start.B;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var intervalR = deltaR / intervals;Di2015NewLine        var intervalG = deltaG / intervals;Di2015NewLine        var intervalB = deltaB / intervals;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var finalR = start.R + (index * intervalR);Di2015NewLine        var finalG = start.G + (index * intervalG);Di2015NewLine        var finalB = start.B + (index * intervalB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Color { R = (byte)finalR, G = (byte)finalG, B = (byte)finalB };Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine

15654940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WPFUIDispatcherService : IDispatcherServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Invoke(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // check if the calling thread is the ui thread Di2015NewLine        if (Application.Current.Dispatcher.CheckAccess())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // current thread is ui thread -> directly fire the eventDi2015NewLine            action.DynamicInvoke();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // current thread is not ui thread so marshall Di2015NewLine            // the event to the ui threadDi2015NewLine            Application.Current.Dispatcher.Invoke(action);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15654940Di2015UniqueSeparatorNotifyPropertyChangedBase

15654940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NotifyPropertyChangedBase : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDispatcherService dispatcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // inject dispatcher service by unityDi2015NewLine    [Dependency]Di2015NewLine    public IDispatcherService Dispatcher { set { dispatcher = value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void RaisePropertyChanged<T>(Di2015NewLine                          Expression<Func<T>> propertyExpressionDi2015NewLine                   )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyChangedEventHandler handler = this.PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MemberExpression memberExpression = Di2015NewLine                    propertyExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            if (memberExpression != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dispatcher.Invoke(() => Di2015NewLine                    handler(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(Di2015NewLine                                            memberExpression.Member.NameDi2015NewLine                                      )Di2015NewLine                           )Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine                     "RaisePropertyChanged event " +Di2015NewLine                     "was not raised with a property: " + Di2015NewLine                     propertyExpression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15656364Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool HasWritePermissionOnDir(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var writeAllow = false;Di2015NewLine        var writeDeny = false;Di2015NewLine        var accessControlList = Directory.GetAccessControl(path);Di2015NewLine        if (accessControlList == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        var accessRules = accessControlList.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier));Di2015NewLine        if (accessRules == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (FileSystemAccessRule rule in accessRules)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((FileSystemRights.Write & rule.FileSystemRights) != FileSystemRights.Write) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (rule.AccessControlType == AccessControlType.Allow)Di2015NewLine                writeAllow = true;Di2015NewLine            else if (rule.AccessControlType == AccessControlType.Deny)Di2015NewLine                writeDeny = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return writeAllow && !writeDeny;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15657638Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BlockingQueue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // We base our queue, on the non-thread safe Di2015NewLine    // .NET 2.0 queue collectionDi2015NewLine    readonly Queue<T> q = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Enqueue(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (q)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            q.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Monitor.Pulse(q);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Dequeue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (q)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (; ; )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (q.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return q.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Monitor.Wait(q);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15661777Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SubstringUntil(this string str, int startIndex, Predicate<char> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (str == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("str");Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("predicate");Di2015NewLine    if (startIndex < 0 || startIndex >= str.Length) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("startIndex");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = startIndex; i < str.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(str[i]))Di2015NewLine            return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(str[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var substring = "123456".SubstringUntil(0, c => c == '6');Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15663083Di2015UniqueSeparatorIMultiValueConvter
15663083Di2015UniqueSeparator// Does a math equation on a series of bound values. Di2015NewLine// Use @VALUEN in your mathEquation as a substitute for bound values, where N is the 0-based index of the bound valueDi2015NewLine// Operator order is parenthesis first, then Left-To-Right (no operator precedence)Di2015NewLinepublic class MathMultiConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object  Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Remove spacesDi2015NewLine        var mathEquation = parameter as string;Di2015NewLine        mathEquation = mathEquation.Replace(" ", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop through values to substitute placeholders for valuesDi2015NewLine        // Using a backwards loop to avoid replacing something like @VALUE10 with @VALUE1Di2015NewLine        for (var i = (values.Length - 1); i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            mathEquation = mathEquation.Replace(string.Format("@VALUE{0}", i), values[i].ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return result of equationDi2015NewLine        return MathConverterHelpers.RunEquation(ref mathEquation);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[]  ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class MathConverterHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly char[] _allOperators = new[] { '+', '-', '*', '/', '%', '(', ')' };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly List<string> _grouping = new List<string> { "(", ")" };Di2015NewLine    private static readonly List<string> _operators = new List<string> { "+", "-", "*", "/", "%" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double RunEquation(ref string mathEquation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Validate values and get list of numbers in equationDi2015NewLine        var numbers = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine        double tmp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string s in mathEquation.Split(_allOperators))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (s != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (double.TryParse(s, out tmp))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    numbers.Add(tmp);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Handle Error - Some non-numeric, operator, or grouping character found in stringDi2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidCastException();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Begin parsing methodDi2015NewLine        EvaluateMathString(ref mathEquation, ref numbers, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // After parsing the numbers list should only have one value - the totalDi2015NewLine        return numbers[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Evaluates a mathematical string and keeps track of the results in a List<double> of numbersDi2015NewLine    private static void EvaluateMathString(ref string mathEquation, ref List<double> numbers, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Loop through each mathemtaical token in the equationDi2015NewLine        string token = GetNextToken(mathEquation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (token != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Remove token from mathEquationDi2015NewLine            mathEquation = mathEquation.Remove(0, token.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If token is a grouping character, it affects program flowDi2015NewLine            if (_grouping.Contains(token))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (token)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "(":Di2015NewLine                        EvaluateMathString(ref mathEquation, ref numbers, index);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case ")":Di2015NewLine                        return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If token is an operator, do requested operationDi2015NewLine            if (_operators.Contains(token))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If next token after operator is a parenthesis, call method recursivelyDi2015NewLine                string nextToken = GetNextToken(mathEquation);Di2015NewLine                if (nextToken == "(")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    EvaluateMathString(ref mathEquation, ref numbers, index + 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Verify that enough numbers exist in the List<double> to complete the operationDi2015NewLine                // and that the next token is either the number expected, or it was a ( meaning Di2015NewLine                // that this was called recursively and that the number changedDi2015NewLine                if (numbers.Count > (index + 1) &&Di2015NewLine                    (double.Parse(nextToken) == numbers[index + 1] || nextToken == "("))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    switch (token)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case "+":Di2015NewLine                            numbers[index] = numbers[index] + numbers[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "-":Di2015NewLine                            numbers[index] = numbers[index] - numbers[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "*":Di2015NewLine                            numbers[index] = numbers[index] * numbers[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "/":Di2015NewLine                            numbers[index] = numbers[index] / numbers[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case "%":Di2015NewLine                            numbers[index] = numbers[index] % numbers[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    numbers.RemoveAt(index + 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Handle Error - Next token is not the expected numberDi2015NewLine                    throw new FormatException("Next token is not the expected number");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            token = GetNextToken(mathEquation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gets the next mathematical token in the equationDi2015NewLine    private static string GetNextToken(string mathEquation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If we're at the end of the equation, return string.emptyDi2015NewLine        if (mathEquation == string.Empty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get next operator or numeric value in equation and return itDi2015NewLine        string tmp = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in mathEquation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_allOperators.Contains(c))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (tmp == "" ? c.ToString() : tmp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tmp += c;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15663084Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool check_ui = UIApplication.CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls;Di2015NewLineUIApplication.CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCall = false;Di2015NewLinevar screen_bounds = UIScreen.MainScreen.Bounds;Di2015NewLineUIApplication.CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls = check_ui;Di2015NewLine

15663333Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //set some test pathsDi2015NewLine    string originalfilepath = @"c:\\temp\\screenshot.bmp";Di2015NewLine    string decompressedfilepath = @"c:\\temp\\screenshot.bmp.gz.bmp";Di2015NewLine    string compressedfilepath = @"c:\\temp\\screenshot.bmp.gz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //read in the original file, this byte array could come from anywhereDi2015NewLine    byte[] originalfilebytes = File.ReadAllBytes(originalfilepath);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("original array size {0} bytes (as read from original file)",originalfilebytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //compress itDi2015NewLine    byte[] compressedfilebytes = Compress(originalfilebytes);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("compressed array size {0} bytes",compressedfilebytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //write it out so we can see it and test the compression with 7zip etcDi2015NewLine compressedfilebytes = File.ReadAllBytes(compressedfilepath);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("compressed array size {0} bytes (as read from compressed file)",compressedfilebytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //decompress the arrayDi2015NewLine    byte[] decompressedfilebytes = Decompress(compressedfilebytes);Di2015NewLine File.WriteAllBytes(decompressedfilepath,decompressedfilebytes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinebyte[] Compress(byte[] b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineusing (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (GZipStream z = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Compress, true))Di2015NewLine        z.Write(b, 0, b.Length);Di2015NewLine    return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinebyte[] Decompress(byte[] b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var bs = new MemoryStream(b))Di2015NewLine        using (var z = new GZipStream(bs, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine            z.CopyTo(ms);Di2015NewLine        return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15663827Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> LazySplit(this string text, string separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int start = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int end = text.IndexOf(separator, start);Di2015NewLine        if (end == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Note: if the string ends with the separator, this will yieldDi2015NewLine            // an empty stringDi2015NewLine            yield return text.Substring(start);Di2015NewLine            yield break; // This will terminate the otherwise-infinite loopDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return text.Substring(start, end - start);Di2015NewLine        start = end + separator.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15663827Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubstring
15663827Di2015UniqueSeparator// TODO: Improve the name :)Di2015NewLinepublic static string TruncateAfterSeparatorCount(string text,Di2015NewLine                                                 string separator,Di2015NewLine                                                 int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // We pretend that the string "starts" with a separator before index 0.Di2015NewLine    int index = -separator.Length;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int nextIndex = text.IndexOf(separator, index + separator.Length);Di2015NewLine        // Not enough separators. Return the whole string. Could throw instead.Di2015NewLine        if (nextIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        index = nextIndex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // We need to handle the count == 0 case, where index will be negative...Di2015NewLine    return text.Substring(0, Math.Max(index, 0));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15667716Di2015UniqueSeparatorsealed class SlashComparer : IComparer<string> { Di2015NewLine  static int CountSlashes(string str) { Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(str)) { Di2015NewLine      return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < str.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      if (str[i] == '/') {Di2015NewLine         count++;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public int Compare(string left, string right) { Di2015NewLine    int leftCount = CountSlashes(left);Di2015NewLine    int rightCount = CountSlashes(right);Di2015NewLine    return rightCount - leftCount;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15669503Di2015UniqueSeparator//Make your return arrayDi2015NewLineint retLen = x.Length / y;      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Add space for the remainderDi2015NewLineif(x.Length % y != 0)Di2015NewLine  retLen++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar ret = new StringCollection[retLen];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Reusing variables is a good way to save memory, but watch naming conventions as this can be confusingDi2015NewLineretLen = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar tempCollection = new StringCollection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < x.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  tempCollection = new StringCollection(tempCollection, x[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if(i % y == 0 || i == x.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ret[retLen++] = tempCollection;Di2015NewLine    tempCollection = new StringCollection();Di2015NewLine    retLen = 0;Di2015NewLine  }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn ret;Di2015NewLine
15669503Di2015UniqueSeparatortempCollection = new StringCollection(tempCollection, x[i]);

15669505Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat C2 = A2 *  otherPoint1
15669505Di2015UniqueSeparator+ B2 * otherPoint1.z
15669587Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] GetBytes(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = new byte[str.Length * sizeof(char)];Di2015NewLine    System.Buffer.BlockCopy(str.ToCharArray(), 0, bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    return bytes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15672215Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int[] GetBookVector(int[][] ratingMatrix, int bookIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] book = new int[ratingMatrix.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < ratingMatrix.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        book[i] = ratingMatrix[i][bookIndex];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return book;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic double Similarity(int[] v1, int[] v2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (v1.Length != v2.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Vectors must be of the same length.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int numerator = 0;Di2015NewLine    double v1Norm = 0;Di2015NewLine    double v2Norm = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < v1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        numerator += v1[i] * v2[i];Di2015NewLine        v1Norm += v1[i] * v1[i];Di2015NewLine        v2Norm += v2[i] * v2[i]; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    v1Norm = Math.Sqrt(v1Norm);Di2015NewLine    v2Norm = Math.Sqrt(v2Norm);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (numerator / (v1Norm * v2Norm));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15672656Di2015UniqueSeparator//Need a dummy type that is throwable and can hold an ExceptionDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class RethrowException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public RethrowException(Exception inner) : base(null, inner) { }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static FunctionalDi2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    public static Exception Rethrow(Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new RethrowException(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TryCatch(Action _try, Action<Exception> _catch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try { _try(); }Di2015NewLine        catch (RethrowException e) { _catch(e.InnerException); }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) { _catch(e); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T TryCatch<T>(Func<T> _try, Func<Exception, T> _catch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try { return _try(); }Di2015NewLine        catch (RethrowException e) { return _catch(e.InnerException); }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) { return _catch(e); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TryCatchFinally(Di2015NewLine        Action _try, Action<Exception> _catch, Action _finally)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try { _try(); }Di2015NewLine        catch (RethrowException e) { _catch(e.InnerException); }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) { _catch(e); }Di2015NewLine        finally { _finally(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T TryCatchFinally<T>(Di2015NewLine        Func<T> _try, Func<Exception, T> _catch, Action _finally)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try { return _try(); }Di2015NewLine        catch (RethrowException e) { return _catch(e.InnerException); }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e) { return _catch(e); }Di2015NewLine        finally { _finally(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15672771Di2015UniqueSeparator// open the external configurationDi2015NewLineConfiguration externalConfig = ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration(externalLibPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get the section we're looking to clone & mergeDi2015NewLinevar sectionToClone = externalConfig.GetSection(sectionName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// "clone" the section; this will create a `DefaultSection` object - not a "pure clone" =[Di2015NewLineConfigurationSectionCloner sectionCloner = new ConfigurationSectionCloner();Di2015NewLinevar clonedSection = sectionCloner.Clone(sectionToClone);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// set the `Type` of the new section to the one we're cloning (most likely a NameValueCollection)Di2015NewLineclonedSection.SectionInformation.Type = sectionToClone.SectionInformation.Type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// set the new section's XML to match the original one (really? the cloner doesn't do this?!)Di2015NewLineclonedSection.SectionInformation.SetRawXml(sectionToClone.SectionInformation.GetRawXml());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// open our local configuration (the "executing application's config)Di2015NewLineConfiguration localConfig = ConfigurationManager.OpenExecConfiguration(ConfigurationUserLevel.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// add the cloned section to itDi2015NewLinelocalConfig.Sections.Add(sectionName, clonedSection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// save the section (this can be any variation-of-parameters for `.Save()`)Di2015NewLinelocalConfig.Save(ConfigurationSaveMode.Minimal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// force ConfigurationManager to refresh the new sectionDi2015NewLineConfigurationManager.RefreshSection(sectionName);Di2015NewLine

             }Di2015NewLine                    // --------------------------------------------------------------------                        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 15677610Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<T,bool>> AnyOf<T>(Di2015NewLine          params Expression<Func<T,bool>>[] expressions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expressions == null || expressions.Length == 0) return x => false;Di2015NewLine    if (expressions.Length == 1) return expressions[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = expressions[0].Body;Di2015NewLine    var param = expressions[0].Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < expressions.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expr = expressions[i];Di2015NewLine        var swappedParam = new SwapVisitor(expr.Parameters.Single(), param)Di2015NewLine                            .Visit(expr.Body);Di2015NewLine        body = Expression.OrElse(body, swappedParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass SwapVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public SwapVisitor(Expression from, Expression to){Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Convert.ToInt32(txtUPC.Text.Trim());Di2015NewLine    } else if (style == ParamStyle.AddVarChar) { // Adding String ValuesDi2015NewLine      // NOTE: Here, you should look in your database table andDi2015NewLine      // use the size you defined for your VendorID and VendorItemID columns.Di2015NewLine      cmd.Parameters.Add("@VendorID", SqlDbType.VarChar, 25).Value = txtVendor.Text.Trim();Di2015NewLine      cmd.Parameters.Add("@VendorItemID", SqlDbType.VarChar, 50).Value = txtUPC.Text.Trim();Di2015NewLine    } else if (style == ParamStyle.AddWithValue) { // Adding as Objects (only if you don't know what the data types are)Di2015NewLine      cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@VendorID", txtVendor.Text.Trim());Di2015NewLine      cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@VendorItemID", txtUPC.Text.Trim());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine      cmd.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLine      using (var myReader = cmd.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.SingleRow)) {Di2015NewLine        if (myReader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine          itemID = myReader.GetString(ITEMID_INDEX);Di2015NewLine          packSize = }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (recordFound) { // set these last, and set them OUTSIDE of the try/catch blockDi2015NewLine    txtID.Text = itemID;Di2015NewLine    txtSize.Text = packSize;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return recordFound;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15684776Di2015UniqueSeparator public TElement RemoveElement(int value, TElement current)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (value != _value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value < _value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current = this;Di2015NewLine                    _left.RemoveElement(value, current);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (value > _value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current = this;Di2015NewLine                    _right.RemoveElement(value, current);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (value == _value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_value < current._value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_left == null && _right == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        current._left = null; Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        current._left = _left;Di2015NewLine                        _left._right = _right;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (_value > current._value)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_left == null && _right == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        current._right = null;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        current._right = _right;Di2015NewLine                        _right._left = _left;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }               Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

15684816Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    WrapFunctionCall( () => DoSomething(5));Di2015NewLine    WrapFunctionCall( () => DoSomethingDifferent("tyto", 4));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void DoSomething(int v){ /* logic */}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void DoSomethingDifferent(string v, int val){ /* another logic */}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void WrapFunctionCall(Action function) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        function();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         //a BUNCH of logic that is the same for all functionsDi2015NewLine         throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15684816Di2015UniqueSeparatorWrapFunctionCall
15684816Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = WrapFunctionCallWithReturn( () => DoSomething(5));Di2015NewLine    var differentResult = WrapFunctionCallWithReturn( () => DoSomethingDifferent("tyto", 4));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int DoSomething(int v){ return 0; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string DoSomethingDifferent(string v, int val){ return "tyto"; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic T WrapFunctionCallWithReturn<T>(Func<T> function) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return function();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //a BUNCH of logic that is the same for all functionsDi2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15684946Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CCR {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private Queue<string> m_queue;Di2015NewLine  private StreamWriter m_writer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public CCR() {Di2015NewLine    m_queue = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine    m_writer = new StreamWriter(string.Format("Log_{0}.txt", DateTime.Now.ToFileTime()));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void ExceptionHandler(Exception ex, string location) {Di2015NewLine    string item = string.Format("{0:u}: {1}\\r\\n\\t\\t{2}", DateTime.Now, location, ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    if (ex.InnerException == null) {Di2015NewLine      m_queue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      m_queue.Enqueue(item + string.Format("\\r\\n\\t\\tInner Exception: {0}", ex.InnerException.Message));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    QueueHandler();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void QueueHandler() {Di2015NewLine    while (0 < m_queue.Count) {Di2015NewLine      m_writer.WriteLine(m_queue.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Close() {Di2015NewLine    QueueHandler();Di2015NewLine    m_writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    m_writer.Close();Di2015NewLine    m_writer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

15694279Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void InitializeDatabase(MyContext context)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //delete any existing database, and re-createDi2015NewLine    context.Database.Delete();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newDbConnString = context.Database.Connection.ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine    var connStringBuilder = new SqlConnectionStringBuilder(newDbConnString);Di2015NewLine    var newDbName = connStringBuilder.InitialCatalog;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    connStringBuilder.InitialCatalog = "master";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //create the new DBDi2015NewLine    using(var sqlConn = new SqlConnection(connStringBuilder.ToString()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var createDbCmd = sqlConn.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            createDbCmd.CommandText = "CREATE DATABASE " + newDbName;Di2015NewLine            sqlConn.Open();Di2015NewLine            createDbCmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //wait up to 30s for the new DB to be fully createdDi2015NewLine    //this takes about 4s on my desktopDi2015NewLine    var attempts = 0;Di2015NewLine    var dbOnline = false;Di2015NewLine    while (attempts < 30 && !dbOnline)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (IsDatabaseOnline(newDbConnString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dbOnline = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            attempts++;Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!dbOnline)Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("Waited too long for the newly created database \\"{0}\\" to come online", newDbName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //apply all migrationsDi2015NewLine    var dbMigrator = new DbMigrator(new Configuration());Di2015NewLine    dbMigrator.Update();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //seed with dataDi2015NewLine    this.Seed(context);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsDatabaseOnline(string connString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var sqlConn = new SqlConnection(connString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sqlConn.Open();Di2015NewLine            return sqlConn.State == ConnectionState.Open;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (SqlException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15695891Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NarrowingSubscriber<TBase, TDerived> : IEventSubscriber<TBase>Di2015NewLine    where TDerived : TBaseDi2015NewLine    where TBase : IEventDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IEventSubscriber<TDerived> inner;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NarrowingSubscriber(IEventSubscriber<TDerived> inner)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (inner == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("inner");Di2015NewLine        this.inner = inner;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AttachSubscriber(IEventSubscriber<TDerived> subscriber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inner = subscriber;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Handle(TBase data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inner.Handle((TDerived)data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Multiplexor<T> : IEventSubscriber<T> where T : IEventDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<IEventSubscriber<T>> subscribers =Di2015NewLine        new List<IEventSubscriber<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AttachSubscriber(IEventSubscriber<T> subscriber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        subscribers.Add(subscriber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RemoveSubscriber(IEventSubscriber<T> subscriber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        subscribers.Remove(subscriber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Handle(T data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        subscribers.ForEach(x => x.Handle(data));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Dispatcher<TBase> : IEventPublisher<TBase> where TBase : IEventDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Type, Multiplexor<TBase>> subscriptions =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<Type, Multiplexor<TBase>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Publish(TBase data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Multiplexor<TBase> multiplexor;Di2015NewLine        if (subscriptions.TryGetValue(data.GetType(), out multiplexor))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            multiplexor.Handle(data);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Subscribe<TEvent>(IEventSubscriber<TEvent> handler)Di2015NewLine        where TEvent : TBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Multiplexor<TBase> multiplexor;Di2015NewLine        if (!subscriptions.TryGetValue(typeof(TEvent), out multiplexor))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            multiplexor = new Multiplexor<TBase>();Di2015NewLine            subscriptions.Add(typeof(TEvent), multiplexor);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        multiplexor.AttachSubscriber(new NarrowingSubscriber<TBase, TEvent>(handler));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15706192Di2015UniqueSeparatorDefault<T>.Value
15706192Di2015UniqueSeparatorT
15706192Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class Default<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly T _value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Default()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T).IsArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (typeof(T).GetArrayRank() > 1)Di2015NewLine                _value = (T)(object)Array.CreateInstance(typeof(T).GetElementType(), new int[typeof(T).GetArrayRank()]);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                _value = (T)(object)Array.CreateInstance(typeof(T).GetElementType(), 0);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // string is IEnumerable<char>, but don't want to treat it like a collectionDi2015NewLine            _value = default(T);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(typeof(T)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // check if an empty array is an instance of TDi2015NewLine            if (typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom(typeof(object[])))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _value = (T)(object)new object[0];Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (typeof(T).IsGenericType && typeof(T).GetGenericArguments().Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type elementType = typeof(T).GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine                if (typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom(elementType.MakeArrayType()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _value = (T)(object)Array.CreateInstance(elementType, 0);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException("No default value is implemented for type " + typeof(T).FullName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _value = default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15706744Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void rsaPlayground()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] data = new byte[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLine        RSACryptoServiceProvider csp = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();//make a new csp with a new keypairDi2015NewLine        var pub_key = csp.ExportParameters(false); // export public keyDi2015NewLine        var priv_key = csp.ExportParameters(true); // export private keyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var encData = csp.Encrypt(data, false); // encrypt with PKCS#1_V1.5 PaddingDi2015NewLine        var decBytes = MyRSAImpl.plainDecryptPriv(encData, priv_key); //decrypt with own BigInteger based implementationDi2015NewLine        var decData = decBytes.SkipWhile(x => x != 0).Skip(1).ToArray();//strip PKCS#1_V1.5 paddingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MyRSAImpl Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static byte[] rsaOperation(byte[] data, BigInteger exp, BigInteger mod)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BigInteger bData = new BigInteger(Di2015NewLine                data    //our data blockDi2015NewLine                .Reverse()  //BigInteger has another byte orderDi2015NewLine                .Concat(new byte[] { 0 }) // append 0 so we are allways handling positive numbersDi2015NewLine                .ToArray() // constructor wants an arrayDi2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine            return Di2015NewLine                BigInteger.ModPow(bData, exp, mod) // the RSA operation itselfDi2015NewLine                .ToByteArray() //make bytes from BigIntegerDi2015NewLine                .Reverse() // back to "normal" byte orderDi2015NewLine                .ToArray(); // return as byte arrayDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /*Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * A few words on Padding:Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             * you will want to strip padding after decryption or apply before encryption Di2015NewLine             * Di2015NewLine             */Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static byte[] plainEncryptPriv(byte[] data, RSAParameters key) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyRSAParams myKey = MyRSAParams.fromRSAParameters(key);Di2015NewLine            return rsaOperation(data, myKey.privExponent, myKey.Modulus);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static byte[] plainEncryptPub(byte[] data, RSAParameters key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyRSAParams myKey = MyRSAParams.fromRSAParameters(key);Di2015NewLine            return rsaOperation(data, myKey.pubExponent, myKey.Modulus);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static byte[] plainDecryptPriv(byte[] data, RSAParameters key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyRSAParams myKey = MyRSAParams.fromRSAParameters(key);Di2015NewLine            return rsaOperation(data, myKey.privExponent, myKey.Modulus);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static byte[] plainDecryptPub(byte[] data, RSAParameters key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyRSAParams myKey = MyRSAParams.fromRSAParameters(key);Di2015NewLine            return rsaOperation(data, myKey.pubExponent, myKey.Modulus);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MyRSAParamsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static MyRSAParams fromRSAParameters(RSAParameters key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var ret = new MyRSAParams();Di2015NewLine            ret.Modulus = new BigInteger(key.Modulus.Reverse().Concat(new byte[] { 0 }).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            ret.privExponent = new BigInteger(key.D.Reverse().Concat(new byte[] { 0 }).ToArray());Di2015NewLine            ret.pubExponent = new BigInteger(key.Exponent.Reverse().Concat(new byte[] { 0 }).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ret;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public BigInteger Modulus;Di2015NewLine        public BigInteger privExponent;Di2015NewLine        public BigInteger pubExponent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15707885Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void DecryptFile(string sInputFilename, string sOutputFilename, string sKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DESCryptoServiceProvider DES = new DESCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    DES.Key = ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes(sKey);Di2015NewLine    DES.IV = ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes(sKey);Di2015NewLine    DES.Mode = CipherMode.CFB;Di2015NewLine    DES.Padding = PaddingMode.ISO10126;Di2015NewLine    FileStream fsread = new FileStream(sInputFilename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform desdecrypt = DES.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cryptostreamDecr = new CryptoStream(fsread, desdecrypt, CryptoStreamMode.Read);Di2015NewLine    FileStream fsDecrypted = new FileStream(sOutputFilename,FileMode.Create,FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLine    cryptostreamDecr.CopyTo(fsDecrypted);Di2015NewLine    fsDecrypted.Flush();Di2015NewLine    fsDecrypted.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15708585Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main( string[ ] args ) {Di2015NewLine        string[] binary = { "{0000}", "{0001}", "{0111}" };Di2015NewLine        var differentNumbers = DifferentNumbers( binary );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach ( Tuple<string, string, int> tuple in differentNumbers )Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine( string.Format( "{0} ; {1} - index {2}", tuple.Item1, tuple.Item2, tuple.Item3 ) );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<Tuple<string, string, int>> DifferentNumbers( string[ ] array ) {Di2015NewLine        var differentNumbers = new List<Tuple<string, string, int>>( );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for ( int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++ ) {Di2015NewLine            for ( int j = i + 1; j < array.Length; j++ ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int count = 0, index = 0;Di2015NewLine                for ( int c = 1; c < array[ i ].Length - 1; c++ ) {Di2015NewLine                    if ( array[ i ][ c ] != array[ j ][ c ] ) {Di2015NewLine                        index = c;Di2015NewLine                        if ( count++ > 1 )Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ( count == 1 )Di2015NewLine                    differentNumbers.Add( new Tuple<string, string, int>( array[ i ], array[ j ], index ) );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return differentNumbers;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15712078Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NetworkReceiver : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IReceiver beaconTable;Di2015NewLine    private XmlSerializer dataDeserializer;Di2015NewLine    private HashSet<TcpClient> ClientTable;Di2015NewLine    private TcpListener connectionListener;Di2015NewLine    private int bufferSize = 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NetworkReceiver(IReceiver inputTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        beaconTable = inputTable;Di2015NewLine        dataDeserializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(CommData));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ClientTable = new HashSet<TcpClient>();Di2015NewLine        connectionListener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, SharedData.connectionPort);Di2015NewLine        connectionListener.Start();Di2015NewLine        connectionListener.BeginAcceptTcpClient(ListenerCallback, connectionListener);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ListenerCallback(IAsyncResult callbackResult)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TcpListener listener = callbackResult.AsyncState as TcpListener;Di2015NewLine        TcpClient client;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            client = listener.EndAcceptTcpClient(callbackResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (ClientTable)Di2015NewLine                ClientTable.Add(client);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ClientObject clientObj = new ClientObject() { AsyncClient = client, Buffer = new byte[bufferSize] };Di2015NewLine            client.GetStream().BeginRead(clientObj.Buffer, 0, bufferSize, ClientReadCallback, clientObj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            listener.BeginAcceptTcpClient(ListenerCallback, listener);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ObjectDisposedException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ClientReadCallback(IAsyncResult callbackResult)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ClientObject clientObj = callbackResult.AsyncState as ClientObject;Di2015NewLine        TcpClient client = clientObj.AsyncClient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!client.Connected)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead = client.GetStream().EndRead(callbackResult);Di2015NewLine            if (bytesRead > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(clientObj.Buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    CommData data;Di2015NewLine                    lock (dataDeserializer)Di2015NewLine                        data = dataDeserializer.Deserialize(ms) as CommData;Di2015NewLine                    lock (beaconTable)Di2015NewLine                        beaconTable.BeaconReceived(data);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catchDi2015NewLine                { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                client.GetStream().BeginRead(clientObj.Buffer, 0, bufferSize, ClientReadCallback, clientObj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                client.Close();Di2015NewLine                lock (ClientTable)Di2015NewLine                    ClientTable.Remove(client);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ex.GetType() == typeof(ObjectDisposedException) || ex.GetType() == typeof(InvalidOperationException))Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ClientObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public TcpClient AsyncClient;Di2015NewLine        public byte[] Buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        connectionListener.Stop();Di2015NewLine        foreach (TcpClient client in ClientTable)Di2015NewLine            client.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection<T>
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorproducer()
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorconsumers()
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetConsumingEnumerable()
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorCompleteAdding()
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorThread.Sleep()
15713710Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThreadPool.SetMinThreads(10, 0); // To help the demo; not needed in real code.Di2015NewLine            var plant = new ProcessingPlant();Di2015NewLine            plant.Process();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Work complete.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public sealed class ProcessingPlantDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly BlockingCollection<string> _queue = new BlockingCollection<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Process()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Parallel.Invoke(producer, consumers);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void producer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 100; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string item = i.ToString();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Producer is queueing {0}", item);Di2015NewLine               _queue.Add(item);  // <- Here's where we add an item to the queue.Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _queue.CompleteAdding(); // <- Here's where we make all the consumersDi2015NewLine        }                            //    exit their foreach loops.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void consumers()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Parallel.Invoke(Di2015NewLine                () => consumer(1),Di2015NewLine                () => consumer(2),Di2015NewLine                () => consumer(3),Di2015NewLine                () => consumer(4),Di2015NewLine                () => consumer(5)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void consumer(int id)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Consumer {0} is starting.", id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in _queue.GetConsumingEnumerable()) // <- Here's where we remove items.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Consumer {0} read {1}", id, item);Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Consumer {0} is stopping.", id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15720669Di2015UniqueSeparatorIObservable
15720669Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<T> DeserializeAsObservable<T>(this TextReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(reader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!jsonReader.Read() || jsonReader.TokenType != JsonToken.StartArray)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<T>(o => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!jsonReader.Read())Di2015NewLine                    o.OnError(new Exception());Di2015NewLine                if (jsonReader.TokenType == JsonToken.EndArray)Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                var obj = serializer.Deserialize<T>(jsonReader);Di2015NewLine                o.OnNext(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            o.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15722613Di2015UniqueSeparatorHelper.GetVisualChild()
15722613Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetVisualChild<T>(DependencyObject parent) where T : VisualDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T child = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int numVisuals = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numVisuals; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Visual v = (Visual)VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine        child = v as T;Di2015NewLine        if (child == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child = GetVisualChild<T>(v);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (child != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return child;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15722990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AppBootstrapper : Bootstrapper<ShellViewModel>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The Castle Windsor containerDi2015NewLine    private IWindsorContainer _container;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Configure()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Configure();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the container, install from the current assembly (installer code shown in next section below)Di2015NewLine        _container = new WindsorContainer();Di2015NewLine        _container.Install(FromAssembly.This());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Matches up with Windsors ResolveAll nicelyDi2015NewLine    protected override IEnumerable<object> GetAllInstances(Type service)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (IEnumerable<object>)_container.ResolveAll(service);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Matches up with Windsors ResolveDi2015NewLine    protected override object GetInstance(Type service, string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.IsNullOrEmpty(key) ? _container.Resolve(service) : _container.Resolve(key, service);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Windsor doesn't do property injection by default, but it's easy enough to get working:Di2015NewLine    protected override void BuildUp(object instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get all writable public properties on the instance we will inject intoDi2015NewLine        instance.GetType().GetProperties().Where(property => property.CanWrite && property.PropertyType.IsPublic)Di2015NewLine        // Make sure we have a matching service type to inject by looking at what's registered in the containerDi2015NewLine                                          .Where(property => _container.Kernel.HasComponent(property.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine        // ...and for each one inject the instanceDi2015NewLine                                          .ForEach(property => property.SetValue(instance, _container.Resolve(property.PropertyType), null));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15722990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExampleViewModel : Screen, Di2015NewLine    // We can navigate to this using DefaultNavigationArgs...Di2015NewLine    IViewModelParams<DefaultNavigationArgs>, Di2015NewLine    // or SomeNavigationArgs, both of which are nested classes...Di2015NewLine    IViewModelParams<SomeOtherNavigationArgs>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class DefaultNavigationArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DefaultNavigationArgs(string value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Value = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class OtherNavigationArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DefaultNavigationArgs(int value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Value = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessParameters(DefaultNavigationArgs modelParams)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        // Do something with argsDi2015NewLine        DisplayName = modelParams.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessParameters(OtherNavigationArgs modelParams)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        // Do something with args. this time they are int!Di2015NewLine        DisplayName = modelParams.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15722990Di2015UniqueSeparatorNavigationService
15722990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NavigationService : INavigationServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Depends on the aggregator - this is how the shell or any interested VMs will receiveDi2015NewLine    // notifications that the user wants to navigate to someplace elseDi2015NewLine    private IEventAggregator _aggregator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NavigationService(IEventAggregator aggregator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _aggregator = aggregator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // And the navigate method goes:Di2015NewLine    public void Navigate(Type viewModelType, object modelParams)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Resolve the viewmodel type from the containerDi2015NewLine        var viewModel = IoC.GetInstance(viewModelType, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Inject any props by passing through IoC buildupDi2015NewLine        IoC.BuildUp(viewModel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check if the viewmodel implements IViewModelParams and call accordinglyDi2015NewLine        var interfaces = viewModel.GetType().GetInterfaces()Di2015NewLine               .Where(x => typeof(IViewModelParams).IsAssignableFrom(x) && x.IsGenericType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Loop through interfaces and find one that matches the generic signature based on modelParams...Di2015NewLine        foreach (var @interface in interfaces)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var type = @interface.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine            var method = @interface.GetMethod("ProcessParameters");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (type.IsAssignableFrom(modelParams.GetType()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If we found one, invoke the method to run ProcessParameters(modelParams)Di2015NewLine                method.Invoke(viewModel, new object[] { modelParams });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Publish an aggregator event to let the shell/other VMs know to change their active viewDi2015NewLine        _aggregator.Publish(new NavigationEventMessage(viewModel));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15725919Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ProcessOutputCharacters(StreamReader streamReader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int outputCharInt;Di2015NewLine    char outputChar;Di2015NewLine    string line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (-1 != (outputCharInt = streamReader.Read()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        outputChar = (char)outputCharInt;Di2015NewLine        if (outputChar == '\\n' || outputChar == '\\r')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (line != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProcessLine("Output: " + line);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            line += outputChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (line.Contains("login as:"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _processTest.StandardInput.Write("myusername");Di2015NewLine                _processTest.StandardInput.Write("\\n");Di2015NewLine                _processTest.StandardInput.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (line.Contains("'s password:"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _processTest.StandardInput.Write("mypassword");Di2015NewLine                _processTest.StandardInput.Write("\\n");Di2015NewLine                _processTest.StandardInput.Flush();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void ProcessLine(string line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (line != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WcfServerHelper.BroadcastRemoteCallback(x => x.PlinkTextOutput(line, DateTime.Now));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (line.Contains("If you do not trust this host, press Return to abandon the"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _processTest.StandardInput.Write("y");Di2015NewLine            _processTest.StandardInput.Write("\\n");Di2015NewLine            _processTest.StandardInput.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (line.Contains("Access granted"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_processTest.HasExited)Di2015NewLine                _processTest.Kill();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WcfServerHelper.BroadcastRemoteCallback(x => x.TestConnectionCallback(PlinkStatus.Success));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (line.Contains("Access denied") || line.Contains("Password authentication failed"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_processTest.HasExited)Di2015NewLine                _processTest.Kill();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WcfServerHelper.BroadcastRemoteCallback(x => x.TestConnectionCallback(PlinkStatus.InvalidUserOrPass));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine          WcfServerHelper.BroadcastRemoteCallback(x => x.TestConnectionCallback(PlinkStatus.InvalidHostname));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (line.Contains("Connection timed System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TcpTunnel {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(String[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( args.Length != 3 ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("<remoteAddress> <remotePort> <listenPort>");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ServerConfiguration config;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            config = new ServerConfiguration( args[0], args[1], args[2] );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } catch(ArgumentException aex) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("<remoteAddress> <remotePort> <listenPort>");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine( aex.Message );Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread serverThread = new Thread( ServerThread );Di2015NewLine        serverThread.Start( config );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Enter \\"q<enter>\\" to stop program.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        String line;Di2015NewLine        while( (line = Console.ReadLine()).ToUpperInvariant() != "Q" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        config.ServerSocket.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both);Di2015NewLine        config.ServerSocket.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ServerConfiguration {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IPAddress RemoteAddress;Di2015NewLine        public UInt16    RemotePort;Di2015NewLine        public UInt16    ListenPort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ServerConfiguration(String remoteAddress, String remotePort, String listenPort) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RemoteAddress = IPAddress.Parse( remoteAddress );Di2015NewLine            RemotePort    = UInt16   .Parse( remotePort, NumberStyles.Integer, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture );Di2015NewLine            ListenPort    = UInt16   .Parse( listenPort, NumberStyles.Integer, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Boolean RunServer = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Socket  ServerSocket;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ServerThread(Object configObj) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ServerConfiguration config = (ServerConfiguration)configObj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        // Setup  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        // Wait for clientDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Socket serverSocket = config.ServerSocket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Unspecified);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        serverSocket.Bind( new IPEndPoint( IPAddress.Any, config.ListenPort ) );Di2015NewLine        serverSocket.Listen(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Now listening for port {0}, will forward to {1}.", config.ListenPort, config.RemotePort);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while( config.RunServer ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Socket client = serverSocket.Accept();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread clientThread = new Thread( ClientThread );Di2015NewLine            clientThread.Start( new ClientContext() { Config = config, Client = client } );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ClientContext {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ServerConfiguration Config;Di2015NewLine        public Socket              Client;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ClientThread(Object contextObj) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ClientContext context = (ClientContext)contextObj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Socket              client = context.Client;Di2015NewLine        ServerConfiguration config = context.Config;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        // Connect to remote server.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IPEndPoint remoteEndPoint = new IPEndPoint( config.RemoteAddress, config.RemotePort );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Socket remote = new Socket( remoteEndPoint.AddressFamily, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Unspecified);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        remote.Connect( remoteEndPoint );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine        // Run tunnel.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Running tunnel.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Byte[] buffer = new Byte[4096];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(;;) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( client.Available > 0 ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Int32 count = client.Receive( buffer );Di2015NewLine                if( count == 0 ) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                remote.Send( buffer, count, SocketFlags.None );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( remote.Available > 0 ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Int32 count = remote.Receive( buffer );Di2015NewLine                if( count == 0 ) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                client.Send( buffer, count, SocketFlags.None );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15733389Di2015UniqueSeparator//Remove the ones that have {display:none}, and the ones with the ids & classes provided.Di2015NewLinestatic bool Remove(HtmlNode x, IList<string> classes, IList<string> ids) {Di2015NewLine    var classAttr = x.GetAttributeValue("class", "");Di2015NewLine    var idAttr = x.GetAttributeValue("id", "");Di2015NewLine    return (x.Name == "span" && x.GetAttributeValue("style", "") == "display:none") ||Di2015NewLine           (x.Name == "div" && x.GetAttributeValue("style", "") == "display:none") ||Di2015NewLine           (x.Name == "span" && classes.Contains(classAttr)) ||Di2015NewLine           (x.Name == "div" && classes.Contains(classAttr)) ||Di2015NewLine           (x.Name == "span" && ids.Contains(idAttr)) ||Di2015NewLine           (x.Name == "id" && ids.Contains(idAttr)) ||Di2015NewLine           (x.Name == "style");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
