15734124Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LoggingProxy<T> : RealProxyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly T _instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private LoggingProxy(T instance)Di2015NewLine        : base(typeof(T))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _instance = instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Create(T instance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)new LoggingProxy<T>(instance).GetTransparentProxy();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IMessage Invoke(IMessage msg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methodCall = (IMethodCallMessage)msg;Di2015NewLine        var method = (MethodInfo)methodCall.MethodBase;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Before invoke: " + method.Name);Di2015NewLine            var result = method.Invoke(_instance, methodCall.InArgs);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("After invoke: " + method.Name);Di2015NewLine            return new ReturnMessage(result, null, 0, methodCall.LogicalCallContext, methodCall);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Exception: " + e);Di2015NewLine            if (e is TargetInvocationException && e.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new ReturnMessage(e.InnerException, msg as IMethodCallMessage);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return new ReturnMessage(e, msg as IMethodCallMessage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15739043Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void PostMultipleFiles(string url, string[] files)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string boundary = "----------------------------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x");Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest httpWebRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.Credentials = System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials;Di2015NewLine    Stream memStream = new System.IO.MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    byte[] boundarybytes =System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("\\r\\n--" + boundary     +"\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    string formdataTemplate = "\\r\\n--" + boundary + "\\r\\nContent-Disposition:  form-data; name=\\"{0}\\";\\r\\n\\r\\n{1}";Di2015NewLine    string headerTemplate = "Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"; filename=\\"{1}\\"\\r\\n Content-Type: application/octet-stream\\r\\n\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine    memStream.Write(boundarybytes, 0, boundarybytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string header = string.Format(headerTemplate, "file" + i, files[i]);Di2015NewLine        //string header = string.Format(headerTemplate, "uplTheFile", files[i]);Di2015NewLine        byte[] headerbytes = System.Text.Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(header);Di2015NewLine        memStream.Write(headerbytes, 0, headerbytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        FileStream fileStream = new FileStream(files[i], FileMode.Open,Di2015NewLine        FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine        while ((bytesRead = fileStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        memStream.Write(boundarybytes, 0, boundarybytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        fileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.ContentLength = memStream.Length;Di2015NewLine    Stream requestStream = httpWebRequest.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine    memStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] tempBuffer = new byte[memStream.Length];Di2015NewLine    memStream.Read(tempBuffer, 0, tempBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine    memStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    requestStream.Write(tempBuffer, 0, tempBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine    requestStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WebResponse webResponse = httpWebRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        Stream stream = webResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(stream);Di2015NewLine        string var = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        response.InnerHtml = ex.Message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest = null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15742197Di2015UniqueSeparatorToDataTable<T>
15742197Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableToDataTableConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this IEnumerable<T> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable dataTable = new DataTable(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        //Get all the propertiesDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] Props = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo prop in Props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Setting column names as Property namesDi2015NewLine            dataTable.Columns.Add(prop.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (T item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newRow = dataTable.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Props.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //inserting property values to datatable rowsDi2015NewLine                newRow[Props[i].Name] = Props[i].GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dataTable.Rows.Add(newRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //put a breakpoint here and check datatableDi2015NewLine        return dataTable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15745068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DateTimeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static ushort ToDosDateTime(this DateTime dateTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uint day = (uint)dateTime.Day;              // Between 1 and 31Di2015NewLine        uint month = (uint)dateTime.Month;          // Between 1 and 12Di2015NewLine        uint years = (uint)(dateTime.Year - 1980);  // From 1980Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (years > 127)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Cannot represent the year.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint dosDateTime = 0;Di2015NewLine        dosDateTime |= day << (16 - 16);Di2015NewLine        dosDateTime |= month << (21 - 16);Di2015NewLine        dosDateTime |= years << (25 - 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return unchecked((ushort)dosDateTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15746409Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static void InputString(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = str.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    InputSender.Input[] inputs = new InputSender.Input[chars.Length * 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ushort ch = (ushort)chars[i];Di2015NewLine        // Key downDi2015NewLine        inputs[i * 2].type = InputSender.InputType.Keyboard;Di2015NewLine        inputs[i * 2].ki.wScan = ch;Di2015NewLine        inputs[i * 2].ki.dwFlags = InputSender.KeyboardEventFlags.Unicode;Di2015NewLine        // Key upDi2015NewLine        inputs[i * 2 + 1].type = InputSender.InputType.Keyboard;Di2015NewLine        inputs[i * 2 + 1].ki.wScan = ch;Di2015NewLine        inputs[i * 2 + 1].ki.dwFlags = InputSender.KeyboardEventFlags.Unicode | InputSender.KeyboardEventFlags.KeyUp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    InputSender.SendInput(inputs);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15746603Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void UpdateMatrices()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// assumes Rotation is a Vector3 containing rotation around each axis expressed in radiansDi2015NewLine        Matrix rotationMatrix = Matrix.CreateFromYawPitchRoll(Rotation.Y, Rotation.X, Rotation.Z);Di2015NewLine        /// View = Matrix.CreateLookAt(Position, Rotation, Vector3.Forward);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        View = Matrix.CreateLookAt(Position, Position + rotationMatrix.Forward, rotationMatrix.Up);Di2015NewLine        Projection = Matrix.CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView(MathHelper.PiOver4, aspectRatio, nearClip, farClip);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// World matrix needs to match your translation and rotation used aboveDi2015NewLine        /// XNA expects matrices to be concatenated in SRT (scale, rotation, then translate) order:Di2015NewLine        World = rotationMatrix * Matrix.CreateTranslation(Position);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CamBoundingFrustrum = new BoundingFrustum(View * Projection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15746647Di2015UniqueSeparatorFieldConverter
15746647Di2015UniqueSeparator[DelimitedRecord(",")]Di2015NewLinepublic partial class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [FieldConverter(ConverterKind.Date, "dd/MM/yyyy")]Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Date;Di2015NewLine    [FieldConverter(typeof(MyTimeConverter))]Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Time1;Di2015NewLine    [FieldConverter(typeof(MyTimeConverter))]Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Time2;Di2015NewLine    [FieldConverter(typeof(MyTimeConverter))]Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Time3;Di2015NewLine    [FieldConverter(ConverterKind.Date, "dd/MM/yyyy")]Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Time4;Di2015NewLine    [FieldDelimiter("|")] // ignore the rest of the fields for this exampleDi2015NewLine    public string Optional3;Di2015NewLine}      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var engine = new FileHelperEngine<MyClass>();Di2015NewLine        var records = engine.ReadString(@"01/10/2013,06:00:00;00,06:09:40;08,00:09:40:09,01/10/2013,06:00:00;00,06:09:40;08,00:09:40:09,""January 9, 2013 - Dreams_01.mp4"",Aired,7CFB84BD-A5B6-43E8-82EC-E78E7219B1C7");Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(records[0].Date, new DateTime(2013, 10, 1));Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(records[0].Time1, DateTime.MinValue.Date.Add(new TimeSpan(0, 6, 0, 0)));Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(records[0].Time2, DateTime.MinValue.Date.Add(new TimeSpan(0, 6, 9, 40, 08)));Di2015NewLine        Assert.AreEqual(records[0].Time3, DateTime.MinValue.Date.Add(new TimeSpan(0, 0, 9, 40, 09)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyTimeConverter : ConverterBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override string FieldToString(object from)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return base.FieldToString(from);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object StringToField(string from)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// apply any logic to clear up the input hereDi2015NewLine        /// for instance, split the string at any ';' or ':'Di2015NewLine        var parts = fromDi2015NewLine            .Split(';', ':')Di2015NewLine            .Select(x => Convert.ToInt32(x))Di2015NewLine            .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if it has three parts assume there are no millisecondsDi2015NewLine        if (parts.Count == 3)Di2015NewLine            return DateTime.MinValue.Date.Add(new TimeSpan(0, parts[0], parts[1], parts[3]));Di2015NewLine        else if (parts.Count == 4) // if it has four parts include millisecondsDi2015NewLine            return DateTime.MinValue.Date.Add(new TimeSpan(0, parts[0], parts[1], parts[2], parts[3]));Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Unexpected format");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

i < array.Length ; i ++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if(array[i] == array[i - 1])Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if(firstEqualIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                firstEqualIndex = i - 1;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else //They are not equalDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //Figure out the average.Di2015NewLine                            if(firstEqualIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                double average = (array[i] - array[firstEqualIndex]) / (Double)((i - firstEqualIndex));Di2015NewLine                                int k = 0;Di2015NewLine                                for(int j = firstEqualIndex; j < i; j++)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    array[j] += average * k;Di2015NewLine                                    k++;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                firstEqualIndex = -1;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //..... to here.Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                foreach (double entry in array)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Append each int to the StringBuilder overload.Di2015NewLine                    builder.Append(entry).Append(", ");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                string result = builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }      Di2015NewLine

15752349Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass AppDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  static void Main()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var q = new WorkQueue();Di2015NewLine    q.Execute(() => Console.WriteLine("A"));Di2015NewLine    q.Execute(() => Console.WriteLine("B"));Di2015NewLine    Task<int> t = q.Execute(() => 33);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(t.Result);Di2015NewLine    q.Dispose();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WorkQueue : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private readonly Thread thread;Di2015NewLine  private readonly BlockingCollection<Action> queue;Di2015NewLine  public WorkQueue()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.queue = new BlockingCollection<Action>();Di2015NewLine    this.thread = new Thread(DoWork);Di2015NewLine    this.thread.Start();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Task<T> Execute<T>(Func<T> f)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (this.queue.IsCompleted) return null;Di2015NewLine    var source = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine    Execute(() => source.SetResult(f()));Di2015NewLine    return source.Task;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Execute(Action f)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (this.queue.IsCompleted) return;Di2015NewLine    this.queue.Add(f);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.queue.CompleteAdding();Di2015NewLine    this.thread.Join();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void DoWork()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    foreach (var action in this.queue.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      action();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15752685Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<Func<E, bool>>> whereList = new List<Expression<Func<E, bool>>>();Di2015NewLinepublic List<E> ExecuteSelectFilter()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<Func<E, bool>> whereFinal = c => true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<Func<E, bool>> whereItem in whereList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (whereItem != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke(whereFinal, whereItem.Parameters.Cast<Expression>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            whereFinal = Expression.Lambda<Func<E, bool>>Di2015NewLine                    (Expression.AndAlso(whereItem.Body, invokedExpr), whereItem.Parameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return this.ObjectContext.CreateQuery<E>(EntitySetName).Where(whereFinal.Compile()).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15752685Di2015UniqueSeparatortableDAO.whereList.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region FiltersDi2015NewLine// FooDi2015NewLineif (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(this.entityValues.Foo)) Di2015NewLine    tableDAO.whereList.Add(q => q.Foo.Contains(this.entityValues.Foo));Di2015NewLine// BarDi2015NewLineif (this.entityValues.Bar > 0) Di2015NewLine    tableDAO.whereList.Add(q => q.Bar== this.entityValues.Bar);Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn tableDAO.ExecuteSelectFilter();Di2015NewLine

15753431Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public static void Main()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var re = @"(?x)  # ignore spaces and commentsDi2015NewLine(?=                    # lookahead (zero width)Di2015NewLine  (Di2015NewLine    \\(                 # first (Di2015NewLine    (?:Di2015NewLine      (?<open> \\( )*   # open++Di2015NewLine      [^()]+Di2015NewLine      (?<-open> \\) )*  # open--Di2015NewLine    )+Di2015NewLine    \\)                 # last )Di2015NewLine    (?(open)(?!))      # fail if unblanaced: open > 0Di2015NewLine  )Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine\\(                     # eat a (, to advance the match a char";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var str = "a + ((b + (c + d)) + (e + f)) + (x + ((y) + (z)) + x)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var m = Regex.Matches(str, re);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("Matched: ");Di2015NewLine      foreach (Match i in m)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(i.Groups[1]);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15754509Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StaticFileHandler : EndpointHandlerBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected static readonly Dictionary<string, string> ExtensionContentType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected FileInfo fi;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static StaticFileHandler()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ExtensionContentType = new Dictionary<string, string>       (StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            { ".text", "text/plain" },Di2015NewLine            { ".js", "text/javascript" },Di2015NewLine            { ".css", "text/css" },Di2015NewLine            { ".html", "text/html" },Di2015NewLine            { ".htm", "text/html" },Di2015NewLine            { ".png", "image/png" },Di2015NewLine            { ".ico", "image/x-icon" },Di2015NewLine            { ".gif", "image/gif" },Di2015NewLine            { ".bmp", "image/bmp" },Di2015NewLine            { ".jpg", "image/jpeg" }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string BaseDirectory { protected set; get; }Di2015NewLine    public string Prefix { protected set; get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StaticFileHandler(string baseDirectory, string prefix) Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        BaseDirectory = baseDirectory;Di2015NewLine        Prefix = prefix;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private StaticFileHandler(FileInfo fi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.fi = fi;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static StaticFileHandler Factory(string baseDirectory, string prefix, string pathInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!pathInfo.StartsWith(prefix, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fn = baseDirectory + "/" + pathInfo.After(prefix.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fi = new System.IO.FileInfo(fn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!fi.Exists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return new StaticFileHandler(fi);Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void ProcessRequest(IHttpRequest httpReq, IHttpResponse httpRes, string operationName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var source = new System.IO.FileStream(fi.FullName, System.IO.FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bytes = source.ReadAllBytes();Di2015NewLine            httpRes.OutputStream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // timeStamp = fi.LastWriteTime;                        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        httpRes.AddHeader("Date", DateTime.Now.ToString("R"));Di2015NewLine        httpRes.AddHeader("Content-Type", ExtensionContentType.Safeget(fi.Extension) ?? "text/plain");                       Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object CreateRequest(IHttpRequest request, string operationName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object GetResponse(IHttpRequest httpReq, IHttpResponse httpRes, object request)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15754877Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Process(StreamWriter outFile, List<Assembly> failedAssemblies)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int MAXLIMIT = 2000;Di2015NewLine    string command = "mstest.exe ";Di2015NewLine    string testcontainer = " /testcontainer:";Di2015NewLine    List<string> testContainerAssemblies = new List<string>(4);Di2015NewLine    int sum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    outFile.WriteLine("SET Path=%MsTestPath%");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var failedAssemblyCollections = (from x in failedAssembliesDi2015NewLine                                     group x by x.AssemblyName into gDi2015NewLine                                     select newDi2015NewLine                                     {Di2015NewLine                                         AssemblyNames = g.Key,                                      Di2015NewLine                                         FullyQualifiedTestMethods = g.Select(i => " /test:" + i.NameSpaceName + "." + i.ClassName + "." + i.FunctionName),Di2015NewLine                                         FullyQualifiedTestMethodsLen = g.Select(i => Convert.ToString(" /test:" + i.NameSpaceName + "." + i.ClassName + "." + i.FunctionName).Length)Di2015NewLine                                     });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in failedAssemblyCollections)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var assemblyNames = item.AssemblyNames;Di2015NewLine            var methodsLengths = item.FullyQualifiedTestMethodsLen.ToList();Di2015NewLine            var flag = true;Di2015NewLine            int counter = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //write for the very first timeDi2015NewLine            if (flag)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Write(outFile, ref command, testcontainer, assemblyNames);Di2015NewLine                flag = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < methodsLengths.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sum += methodsLengths[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (sum <= MAXLIMIT)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    command += item.FullyQualifiedTestMethods.ToList()[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //this will execute when a long command is splitted and is written in new trx filesDi2015NewLine                    if (flag)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        counter++;Di2015NewLine                        Write(outFile, ref command, testcontainer, assemblyNames);Di2015NewLine                        flag = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //if the value crosses max limitDi2015NewLine                //write the current outputDi2015NewLine                //then reset variables to original Di2015NewLine                if (sum >= MAXLIMIT)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outFile.Write(command);Di2015NewLine                    sum = 0;Di2015NewLine                    flag = true;Di2015NewLine                    i--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            outFile.Write(command);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Write(StreamWriter outFile, ref string command, string testcontainer, string assemblyNames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    outFile.WriteLine(' ');Di2015NewLine    command = "mstest.exe ";Di2015NewLine    command += testcontainer + "\\\\" + assemblyNames + " ";  Di2015NewLine    command += " /runconfig:";Di2015NewLine    command += " /detail:owner";Di2015NewLine    command += " /detail:duration";Di2015NewLine    command += " /detail:description";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    command += " /unique ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15756914Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static XElement GetGeocodingSearchResults(string address)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Use the Google Geocoding service to get information about the user-entered addressDi2015NewLine    // See http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/geocoding/index.html for more info...Di2015NewLine    string url = String.Format("http://maps.google.com/maps/api/geocode/xml?address={0}&sensor=false",Di2015NewLine       HttpContext.Current.Server.UrlEncode(address));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load the XML into an XElement object (whee, LINQ to XML!)Di2015NewLine    XElement results = XElement.Load(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check the statusDi2015NewLine    string status =results.Element ("status").Value;Di2015NewLine    if (status != "OK" && status != "ZERO_RESULTS")Di2015NewLine        // Whoops, something else was wrong with the request...Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("There was an error with Google's Geocoding Service: " + status);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

   {Di2015NewLine            DragDelta += new DragDeltaEventHandler(this.ResizeThumb_DragDelta);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ResizeThumb_DragDelta(object sender, DragDeltaEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Control designerItem = this.DataContext as Control;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (designerItem != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double deltaVertical, deltaHorizontal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (VerticalAlignment)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case VerticalAlignment.Bottom:Di2015NewLine                        deltaVertical = Math.Min(-e.VerticalChange, designerItem.ActualHeight - designerItem.MinHeight);Di2015NewLine                        designerItem.Height -= deltaVertical;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case VerticalAlignment.Top:Di2015NewLine                        deltaVertical = Math.Min(e.VerticalChange, designerItem.ActualHeight - designerItem.MinHeight);Di2015NewLine                        Canvas.SetTop(designerItem, Canvas.GetTop(designerItem) + deltaVertical);Di2015NewLine                        designerItem.Height -= deltaVertical;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (HorizontalAlignment)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case HorizontalAlignment.Left:Di2015NewLine                        deltaHorizontal = Math.Min(e.HorizontalChange, designerItem.ActualWidth - designerItem.MinWidth);Di2015NewLine                        Canvas.SetLeft(designerItem, Canvas.GetLeft(designerItem) + deltaHorizontal);Di2015NewLine                        designerItem.Width -= deltaHorizontal;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case HorizontalAlignment.Right:Di2015NewLine                        deltaHorizontal = Math.Min(-e.HorizontalChange, designerItem.ActualWidth - designerItem.MinWidth);Di2015NewLine                        designerItem.Width -= deltaHorizontal;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MoveThumb : ThumbDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public MoveThumb()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DragDelta += new DragDeltaEventHandler(this.MoveThumb_DragDelta);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void MoveThumb_DragDelta(object sender,       {Di2015NewLine                double left = Canvas.GetLeft(designerItem);Di2015NewLine                double top = Canvas.GetTop(designerItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Canvas.SetLeft(designerItem, left + e.HorizontalChange);Di2015NewLine                Canvas.SetTop(designerItem, top + e.VerticalChange);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine 15761221Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnumerable.Concat()
15761221Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [STAThread]Di2015NewLine        private static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var stringList = new List<string> {"One", "Two", "Three"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IEnumerable<string> originalSequence = stringList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var newSequence = originalSequence.Concat("Four");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var text in newSequence)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(text); // Prints "One" "Two" "Three" "Four".Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class EnumerableExtDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Concatenates a scalar to a sequence.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">The type of elements in the sequence.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="sequence">a sequence.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="item">The scalar item to concatenate to the sequence.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A sequence which has the specified item appended to it.</returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// The standard .Net IEnumerable extensions includes a Concat() operator which concatenates a sequence to another sequence.Di2015NewLine        /// However, it does not allow you to concat a scalar to a sequence. This operator provides that ability.Di2015NewLine        /// </remarks>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<T> Concat<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence, T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return sequence.Concat(new[] { item });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15761557Di2015UniqueSeparator private void dispatcherTimer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Storyboard MyStory = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Duration = new TimeSpan(0, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        DoubleAnimation My_Double = new DoubleAnimation();Di2015NewLine        My_Double.Duration = new TimeSpan(0, 0, 1);Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Children.Add(My_Double);Di2015NewLine        RotateTransform MyTransform = new RotateTransform();Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTarget(My_Double, MyTransform);Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(My_Double, new PropertyPath("Angle"));Di2015NewLine        My_Double.To = 360;Di2015NewLine        YourImage.RenderTransform = MyTransform;Di2015NewLine        YourImage.RenderTransformOrigin = new Point(0.5, 0.5);       Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Begin();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15761557Di2015UniqueSeparator void rotate(int i)Di2015NewLine       {            Di2015NewLine        Storyboard MyStory = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Duration = new TimeSpan(0,0,1);           Di2015NewLine        DoubleAnimation My_Double = new DoubleAnimation();Di2015NewLine        My_Double.Duration =  new TimeSpan(0,0,1);          Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Children.Add(My_Double);Di2015NewLine        RotateTransform MyTransform = new RotateTransform();Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTarget(My_Double, MyTransform);Di2015NewLine        Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(My_Double, new PropertyPath("Angle"));Di2015NewLine        My_Double.From = i;Di2015NewLine        My_Double.To = i +90;Di2015NewLine        m_Image.RenderTransform = MyTransform;Di2015NewLine        m_Image.RenderTransformOrigin = new Point(0.5, 0.5);            Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Begin();Di2015NewLine        MyStory.Completed +=((arg,c) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i == 360)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rotate(0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rotate(i + 90);Di2015NewLine            }        Di2015NewLine        });                                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15763029Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool HasChild(int id) {Di2015NewLine    returnDi2015NewLine        db.Keywords.Any(item => item.Parent == id);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool HasGrandChilds(int id) {Di2015NewLine    returnDi2015NewLine        db.Keywords.Where(item => item.Parent == id).Any(item => HasChild(item.ID);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15763029Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool HasGrandChilds(int id, int depth) {Di2015NewLine    var lst = new List<Keywords>();Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < depth - 1; i++) {Di2015NewLine        if (i == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Initial search at first loop runDi2015NewLine            lst = db.Keywords.Where(item => item.ParentId == id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Search all entries, where the parent is in our given possible parentsDi2015NewLine            lst = db.Keywords.Where(item => lst.Any(k => k.Id == item.Parent));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!lst.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //If no more children where found, the searched depth doesn't existDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15769343Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource DoDictionaries<TSource, TValue>(TSource source, Func<TValue, TValue> cleanUpper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = typeof(TSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] propertyInfos = typeDi2015NewLine            .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine            .Where(info => info.PropertyType.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine                           info.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof (Dictionary<,>) &&Di2015NewLine                           info.PropertyType.GetGenericArguments()[1] == typeof (TValue))Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var propertyInfo in propertyInfos)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dict = (IDictionary)propertyInfo.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine            var newDict = (IDictionary)Activator.CreateInstance(propertyInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var key in dict.Keys)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newDict[key] = cleanUpper((TValue)dict[key]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            propertyInfo.SetValue(source, newDict, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15771383Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool NowInTimeRange(string startTimeString, string endTimeString, string timeZoneId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // convert to timespanDi2015NewLine    var startTime = TimeSpan.Parse(startTimeString);Di2015NewLine    var endTime = TimeSpan.Parse(endTimeString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // what time is it in the timezone specified?Di2015NewLine    var now = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId(DateTime.UtcNow, timeZoneId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if they are in order, are we between the times specified?Di2015NewLine    if (startTime <= endTime)Di2015NewLine        return now.TimeOfDay >= startTime && now.TimeOfDay <= endTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // when not in order, just see if either one of them matches.Di2015NewLine    return now.TimeOfDay >= startTime || now.TimeOfDay <= endTime;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15774049Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public struct SwapIndexDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int i; public int j;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    delegate void UIswap(int i, int j);Di2015NewLine    const int scale = 4;Di2015NewLine    const int size = 50;Di2015NewLine    Int32[] data = new Int32[size];Di2015NewLine    bool Working = false;Di2015NewLine    Line[] lines = new Line[size];Di2015NewLine    public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        this.Loaded += new RoutedEventHandler(MainWindow_Loaded);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void MainWindow_Loaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Draw();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void Draw()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        canvas1.Children.Clear();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[i] = i;Di2015NewLine            lines[i] = new Line()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                X1 = 0,Di2015NewLine                Y1 = i * scale,Di2015NewLine                X2 = i * scale,Di2015NewLine                Y2 = i * scale,Di2015NewLine                StrokeThickness = 2,Di2015NewLine                Stroke = new SolidColorBrush(Colors.Black)Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            canvas1.Children.Add(lines[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Sort_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Working) return;Di2015NewLine        Working = true;Di2015NewLine        Thread T1 = new Thread(new ThreadStart(BubbleSimple));Di2015NewLine        T1.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void BubbleSimple()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool flag = false;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            flag = false;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (data[i] > data[i + 1])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    flag = true;Di2015NewLine                    swapData(i, i + 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (flag);Di2015NewLine        Working = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void swapData(int i, int j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var temp = data[i];Di2015NewLine        data[i] = data[j];Di2015NewLine        data[j] = temp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UIswap swap = (i1, j1) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tempd = lines[i1].X2;Di2015NewLine            lines[i1].X2 = lines[j1].X2;Di2015NewLine            lines[j1].X2 = tempd;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        canvas1.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(swap, new object[] { i, j });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Randomize(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker bw = (BackgroundWorker)sender;Di2015NewLine        Random R = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int j = R.Next(data.Length);Di2015NewLine            bw.ReportProgress(1, new SwapIndex() { i = i, j = j });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void SwapLine(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = ((SwapIndex)e.UserState).i;Di2015NewLine        int j = ((SwapIndex)e.UserState).j;Di2015NewLine        int t = data[i];Di2015NewLine        data[i] = data[j];Di2015NewLine        data[j] = t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double temp;Di2015NewLine        temp = lines[i].X2;Di2015NewLine        lines[i].X2 = lines[j].X2;Di2015NewLine        lines[j].X2 = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void Suffle_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Working) return;Di2015NewLine        Working = true;Di2015NewLine        BackgroundWorker bw = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine        bw.WorkerReportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLine        bw.WorkerSupportsCancellation = false;Di2015NewLine        bw.DoWork += new DoWorkEventHandler(Randomize);Di2015NewLine        bw.ProgressChanged += new ProgressChangedEventHandler(SwapLine);Di2015NewLine        bw.RunWorkerCompleted += delegate(object s1, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Working = false;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        bw.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15774364Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetMaskedNumber(string number)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(number))Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (number.Length <= 5)Di2015NewLine        return number;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string last5 = number.Substring(number.Length - 5, 5);Di2015NewLine    var maskedChars = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < number.Length - 5; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        maskedChars.Append(number[i] == '-' ? 15776918Di2015UniqueSeparator#define MAX_NEG ... //some small numberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetemplate <typename T, int BLKSZ> __global__Di2015NewLinevoid cu_max_reduce(const T* d_data, const int d_len, T* max_val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    volatile __shared__ T smem[BLKSZ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int tid = threadIdx.x;Di2015NewLine    const int bid = blockIdx.x;Di2015NewLine        //starting index for each block to begin loading the input data into shared memoryDi2015NewLine    const int bid_sidx = bid*BLKSZ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //load the input data to smem, with padding if needed. each thread handles 2 elementsDi2015NewLine    #pragma unrollDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine                //get the index for the thread to load into shared memoryDi2015NewLine        const int tid_idx = 2*tid + i;Di2015NewLine        const int ld_idx = bid_sidx + tid_idx;Di2015NewLine        if(ld_idx < (bid+1)*BLKSZ && ld_idx < d_len)Di2015NewLine            smem[tid_idx] = d_data[ld_idx];Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            smem[tid_idx] = MAX_NEG;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        __syncthreads();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //run the reduction per-blockDi2015NewLine    for (unsigned int stride = BLKSZ/2; stride > 0; stride >>= 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(tid < stride)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            smem[tid] = ((smem[tid] > smem[tid + stride]) ? smem[tid]:smem[tid + stride]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        __syncthreads();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //write the per-block result out from shared memory to global memoryDi2015NewLine    max_val[bid] = smem[0];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//assume we have d_data as a device pointer with our data, of length data_lenDi2015NewLinetemplate <typename T> __host__Di2015NewLineT cu_find_max(const T* d_data, const int data_len)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //in your host code, invoke the kernel with something along the lines of:Di2015NewLine    const int thread_per_block = 16; Di2015NewLine    const int elem_per_thread = 2;Di2015NewLine    const int BLKSZ = elem_per_thread*thread_per_block; //number of elements to process per blockDi2015NewLine    const int blocks_per_grid = ceil((float)data_len/(BLKSZ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    dim3 block_dim(thread_per_block, 1, 1);Di2015NewLine    dim3 grid_dim(blocks_per_grid, 1, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T *d_max;Di2015NewLine    cudaMalloc((void **)&d_max, sizeof(T)*blocks_per_grid); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cu_max_reduce <T, BLKSZ> <<<grid_dim, block_dim>>> (d_data, data_len, d_max);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //etc....Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15780481Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ConvertToFullUrl(this string relativeUrl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!Uri.IsWellFormedUriString(relativeUrl, UriKind.Absolute))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!relativeUrl.StartsWith("/"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relativeUrl = relativeUrl.Insert(0, "/");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (relativeUrl.StartsWith("~/"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            relativeUrl = relativeUrl.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return string.Format(Di2015NewLine            "{0}://{1}{2}{3}",Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Request.Url.Scheme,Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Request.Url.Host,Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Request.Url.Port == 80 ? "" : ":" + HttpContext.Current.Request.Url.Port.ToString(),Di2015NewLine            relativeUrl);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15783245Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyObjectBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type objType { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyObjectBuilder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.objType = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object CreateNewObject(List<Field> Fields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.objType = CompileResultType(Fields);Di2015NewLine        var myObject = Activator.CreateInstance(this.objType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return myObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IList getObjectList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type listType = typeof(List<>).MakeGenericType(this.objType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (IList)Activator.CreateInstance(listType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MethodInfo GetCompareToMethod(object genericInstance, string sortExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type genericType = genericInstance.GetType();Di2015NewLine        object sortExpressionValue = genericType.GetProperty(sortExpression).GetValue(genericInstance, null);Di2015NewLine        Type sortExpressionType = sortExpressionValue.GetType();Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo compareToMethodOfSortExpressionType = sortExpressionType.GetMethod("CompareTo", new Type[] { sortExpressionType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return compareToMethodOfSortExpressionType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type CompileResultType(List<Field> Fields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TypeBuilder tb = GetTypeBuilder();Di2015NewLine        ConstructorBuilder constructor = tb.DefineDefaultConstructor(MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.RTSpecialName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NOTE: assuming your list contains Field objects with fields FieldName(string) and FieldType(Type)Di2015NewLine        foreach (var field in Fields)Di2015NewLine            CreateProperty(tb, field.FieldName, field.FieldType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type objectType = tb.CreateType();Di2015NewLine        return objectType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static TypeBuilder GetTypeBuilder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var typeSignature = "MyDynamicType";Di2015NewLine        var an = new AssemblyName(typeSignature);Di2015NewLine        AssemblyBuilder assemblyBuilder = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(an, AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine        ModuleBuilder moduleBuilder = assemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule("MainModule");Di2015NewLine        TypeBuilder tb = moduleBuilder.DefineType(typeSignatureDi2015NewLine                            , TypeAttributes.Public |Di2015NewLine                            TypeAttributes.Class |Di2015NewLine                            TypeAttributes.AutoClass |Di2015NewLine                            TypeAttributes.AnsiClass |Di2015NewLine                            TypeAttributes.BeforeFieldInit |Di2015NewLine                            TypeAttributes.AutoLayoutDi2015NewLine                            , null);Di2015NewLine        return tb;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CreateProperty(TypeBuilder tb, string propertyName, Type propertyType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FieldBuilder fieldBuilder = tb.DefineField("_" + propertyName, propertyType, FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PropertyBuilder propertyBuilder = tb.DefineProperty(propertyName, PropertyAttributes.HasDefault, propertyType, null);Di2015NewLine        MethodBuilder getPropMthdBldr = tb.DefineMethod("get_" + propertyName, MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.HideBySig, propertyType, Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine        ILGenerator getIl = getPropMthdBldr.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        getIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        getIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, fieldBuilder);Di2015NewLine        getIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodBuilder setPropMthdBldr =Di2015NewLine            tb.DefineMethod("set_" + propertyName,Di2015NewLine              MethodAttributes.Public |Di2015NewLine              MethodAttributes.SpecialName |Di2015NewLine              MethodAttributes.HideBySig,Di2015NewLine              null, new[] { propertyType });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ILGenerator setIl = setPropMthdBldr.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        Label modifyProperty = setIl.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine        Label exitSet = setIl.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setIl.MarkLabel(modifyProperty);Di2015NewLine        setIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        setIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine        setIl.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, fieldBuilder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setIl.Emit(OpCodes.Nop);Di2015NewLine        setIl.MarkLabel(exitSet);Di2015NewLine        setIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        propertyBuilder.SetGetMethod(getPropMthdBldr);Di2015NewLine        propertyBuilder.SetSetMethod(setPropMthdBldr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15783245Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FieldDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public string FieldName;Di2015NewLine   public Type FieldType;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15783245Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetMemberValue(MemberInfo member, object target, object value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   switch (member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine           ((FieldInfo)member).SetValue(target, value);Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine       case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine           ((PropertyInfo)member).SetValue(target, value, null);Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine       default:Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentException("MemberInfo must be if type FieldInfo or PropertyInfo", "member");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15783245Di2015UniqueSeparator//Creating a List of Fields (string FieldName, Type FieldType) Di2015NewLineList<Field> Fields = new List<Field>();Di2015NewLineFields.Add(new Field { FieldName = "TestName", FieldType = typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//MyObjectBuilder ClassDi2015NewLineMyObjectBuilder o = new MyObjectBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Creating a new object dynamicallyDi2015NewLineobject newObj = o.CreateNewObject(Fields);Di2015NewLineIList objList = o.getObjectList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineType t = newObj.GetType();Di2015NewLineobject instance = Activator.CreateInstance(t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePropertyInfo[] props = instance.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint instancePropsCount = props.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < instancePropsCount; ++i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string fieldName = props[i].Name;Di2015NewLine   MemberInfo[] mInfo = null;Di2015NewLine   PropertyInfo pInfo = newObj.GetType().GetProperty(fieldName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (pInfo != null)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       var value = pInfo.GetValue(newObj, null);Di2015NewLine       mInfo = t.GetMember(fieldName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (value != null && mInfo != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(mInfo[0].ToString()))Di2015NewLine           SetMemberValue(mInfo[0], instance, value);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       mInfo = t.GetMember(fieldName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (mInfo != null && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(mInfo[0].ToString()))Di2015NewLine           SetMemberValue(mInfo[0], instance, null);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineobjList.Add(instance);Di2015NewLine

15786934Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IQueryable<Stat> ErrorFilter(IQueryable<Stat> source, bool[] WarnLevel) {Di2015NewLine    // extract the enabled indices (match to values)Di2015NewLine    int[] levels = WarnLevel.Select((val, index) => new { val, index })Di2015NewLine                            .Where(pair => pair.val)Di2015NewLine                            .Select(pair => pair.index).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch(levels.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 0:Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(x => false);Di2015NewLine        case 1:Di2015NewLine            int level = levels[0];Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(x => x.WarnLevel == level);Di2015NewLine        case 2:Di2015NewLine            int level0 = levels[0], level1 = levels[1];Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(Di2015NewLine                  x => x.WarnLevel == level0 || x.WarnLevel == level1);Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(x => levels.Contains(x.WarnLevel));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15786934Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IQueryable<Stat> DateFilter(IQueryable<Stat> source,Di2015NewLine      DateTime begin, DateTime end)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var from = begin.ToFileTime(), to = end.ToFileTime();Di2015NewLine    return source.Where(table => table.RecordTime >= fromDi2015NewLine        && table.RecordTime <= to);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15786934Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IQueryable<Stat> DictionaryFilter(IQueryable<Stat> source,Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<GetSourcesNameResult, bool> sourceDictionary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var words = (from word in sourceDictionaryDi2015NewLine                 where word.ValueDi2015NewLine                 select word.Key.SourceName).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (words.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 0:Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(x => false);Di2015NewLine        case 1:Di2015NewLine            string word = words[0];Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(x => x.SourceName == word);Di2015NewLine        case 2:Di2015NewLine            string word0 = words[0], word1 = words[1];Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(Di2015NewLine                  x => x.SourceName == word0 || x.SourceName == word1);Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            return source.Where(x => words.Contains(x.SourceName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15793506Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic  void record()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    // http://relay.pandora.radioabf.net:9000Di2015NewLine    String server = "http://radio.mosaiquefm.net:8000/mosalive";Di2015NewLine    String serverPath = "/";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String destPath = "A:\\\\";           // destination path for saved songsDi2015NewLine    String fname="test";Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = null; // web requestDi2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse response = null; // web responseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int metaInt = 0; // blocksize of mp3 dataDi2015NewLine    int count = 0; // byte counterDi2015NewLine    int metadataLength = 0; // length of metadata headerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte [ 512 ]; // receive bufferDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stream socketStream = null; // input stream on the web requestDi2015NewLine    Stream byteOut = null; // output stream on the destination fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create web requestDi2015NewLine    request = ( HttpWebRequest ) WebRequest . Create ( server );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // clear old request header and build own header to receive ICY-metadataDi2015NewLine    request . Headers . Clear ( );Di2015NewLine    request . Headers . Add ( "GET" , serverPath + " HTTP/1.0" );Di2015NewLine    request . Headers . Add ( "Icy-MetaData" , "1" ); // needed to receive metadata informationsDi2015NewLine    request . UserAgent = "WinampMPEG/5.09";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // execute requestDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        response = ( HttpWebResponse ) request . GetResponse ( );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    catch ( Exception ex )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        Console . WriteLine ( ex . Message );Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // read blocksize to find metadata headerDi2015NewLine    metaInt = Convert . ToInt32 ( response . GetResponseHeader ( "icy-metaint" ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        // open stream on responseDi2015NewLine        socketStream = response . GetResponseStream ( );Di2015NewLine        byteOut = createNewFile ( destPath , fname );Di2015NewLine        // rip stream in an endless loopDi2015NewLine        while ( byteOut . Length <1024000) // 23650000 ~ 30 min     Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            // read byteblockDi2015NewLine            int bufLen = socketStream . Read ( buffer , 0 , buffer . Length );Di2015NewLine            if ( bufLen < 0 )Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for ( int i=0 ; i < bufLen ; i++ )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                  if ( count++ < metaInt ) // write bytes to filestreamDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                        if ( byteOut != null ) // as long as we don't have a songtitle, we don't open a new file and don't write any bytesDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                            byteOut . Write ( buffer , i , 1 );Di2015NewLine                            if ( count % 100 == 0 )Di2015NewLine                                byteOut . Flush ( );Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    else // get headerlength from lengthbyte and multiply by 16 to get correct headerlengthDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                        metadataLength = Convert . ToInt32 ( buffer [ i ] ) * 16;Di2015NewLine                        count = 0;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                   }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    catch ( Exception ex )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        Console . WriteLine ( ex . Message );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        if ( byteOut != null )Di2015NewLine            byteOut . 15793780Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string sentence(string statement)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (statement.Length > 37)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var words = statement.Split(' ');        Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder completedWord = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int charCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (words.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 1; i < words.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        charCount += words[i].Length;Di2015NewLine        if (charCount >= 37)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          completedWord.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine          charCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        completedWord.Append(words[i]);Di2015NewLine        completedWord.Append(" ");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add the last wordDi2015NewLine    if (completedWord.Length + words[words.Length - 1].Length >= 37)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      completedWord.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    completedWord.Append(words[words.Length - 1]);Di2015NewLine    return completedWord.ToString();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return statement;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15794836Di2015UniqueSeparator//Grab original query as a DataServiceQueryDi2015NewLineDataServiceQuery<NetworkDevice> originalquery = (DataServiceQuery<NetworkDevice>) Di2015NewLine    (from x in NetworkDevicesDi2015NewLine    where   Di2015NewLine    x.Type == "switch"Di2015NewLine    select x);Di2015NewLine//Get the HTTP QueryStringDi2015NewLinevar querystr = (originalquery).RequestUri.Query;Di2015NewLinevar filter = System.Web.HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(querystr)["$filter"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Create our own dynamic filter equivilant to Di2015NewLine    x.Name == "x" ||Di2015NewLine    x.Name == "y" Di2015NewLine*/Di2015NewLinestring[] names = { "device1", "device2" };Di2015NewLineStringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinesb.Append("(");Di2015NewLineforeach (string s in names)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(String.Format("Name eq '{0}'",s));Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(" or ");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinesb.Remove(sb.Length - 4, 4);Di2015NewLinesb.Append(")");Di2015NewLinevar dynamicfilter = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine// If there was an original filter we'll add the dynamic one with AND , otherwise we'll just use the dynamiconeDi2015NewLinevar newfilter = dynamicfilter;Di2015NewLineif ( filter != null && filter.Trim() != string.Empty )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinenewfilter = filter + " and " + newfilter;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinenewfilter.Dump();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar finalquery = Di2015NewLine    (from x in NetworkDevices.AddQueryOption("$filter",newfilter)Di2015NewLine    select x).Take(50);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefinalquery.Dump();Di2015NewLine

15796352Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayoutAttribute(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinestruct SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR {Di2015NewLine    public byte revision;Di2015NewLine    public byte dacl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("advapi32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern bool QueryServiceObjectSecurity(IntPtr serviceHandle, Di2015NewLine    System.Security.AccessControl.SecurityInfos secInfo, Di2015NewLine    ref SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR lpSecDesrBuf, Di2015NewLine    uint bufSize, Di2015NewLine    out uint bufSizeNeeded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("advapi32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern bool QueryServiceObjectSecurity(SafeHandle serviceHandle, Di2015NewLine    System.Security.AccessControl.SecurityInfos secInfo, Di2015NewLine    byte[] lpSecDesrBuf, Di2015NewLine    uint bufSize, Di2015NewLine    out uint bufSizeNeeded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("advapi32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern bool SetServiceObjectSecurity(SafeHandle serviceHandle, Di2015NewLine    System.Security.AccessControl.SecurityInfos secInfos, Di2015NewLine    byte[] lpSecDesrBuf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SetServicePermissions(string service, string username) {Di2015NewLine    System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController sc = new System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController(service, ".");Di2015NewLine    ServiceControllerStatus status = sc.Status;Di2015NewLine    byte[] psd = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine    uint bufSizeNeeded;Di2015NewLine    bool ok = QueryServiceObjectSecurity(sc.ServiceHandle, SecurityInfos.DiscretionaryAcl, psd, 0, out bufSizeNeeded);Di2015NewLine    if (!ok) {Di2015NewLine        int err = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine        if (err == 122 || err == 0) { // ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFERDi2015NewLine            // expected; now we know bufsizeDi2015NewLine            psd = new byte[bufSizeNeeded];Di2015NewLine            ok = QueryServiceObjectSecurity(sc.ServiceHandle, SecurityInfos.DiscretionaryAcl, psd, bufSizeNeeded, out bufSizeNeeded);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("error calling QueryServiceObjectSecurity() to get DACL for " + _name + ": error code=" + err);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!ok)Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("error calling QueryServiceObjectSecurity(2) to get DACL for " + _name + ": error code=" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get security descriptor via raw into DACL form so ACEDi2015NewLine    // ordering checks are done for us.Di2015NewLine    RawSecurityDescriptor rsd = new RawSecurityDescriptor(psd, 0);Di2015NewLine    RawAcl racl = rsd.DiscretionaryAcl;Di2015NewLine    DiscretionaryAcl dacl = new DiscretionaryAcl(false, false, racl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add start/stop/read accessDi2015NewLine    NTAccount acct = new NTAccount(username);Di2015NewLine    SecurityIdentifier sid = (SecurityIdentifier) acct.Translate(typeof(SecurityIdentifier));Di2015NewLine    // 0xf7 is SERVICE_QUERY_CONFIG|SERVICE_CHANGE_CONFIG|SERVICE_QUERY_STATUS|Di2015NewLine    // SERVICE_START|SERVICE_STOP|SERVICE_PAUSE_CONTINUE|SERVICE_INTERROGATEDi2015NewLine    dacl.AddAccess(AccessControlType.Allow, sid, 0xf7, InheritanceFlags.None, PropagationFlags.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // convert discretionary ACL back to raw form; looks like via byte[] is only wayDi2015NewLine    byte[] rawdacl = new byte[dacl.BinaryLength];Di2015NewLine    dacl.GetBinaryForm(rawdacl, 0);Di2015NewLine    rsd.DiscretionaryAcl = new RawAcl(rawdacl, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // set raw security descriptor on service againDi2015NewLine    byte[] rawsd = new byte[rsd.BinaryLength];Di2015NewLine    rsd.GetBinaryForm(rawsd, 0);Di2015NewLine    ok = SetServiceObjectSecurity(sc.ServiceHandle, SecurityInfos.DiscretionaryAcl, rawsd);Di2015NewLine    if (!ok) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("error calling SetServiceObjectSecurity(); error code=" + Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15799490Di2015UniqueSeparator public class WhateverDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int SkuNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string FirstName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string LastName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [WebMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void HelloWorld(string xmlString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //make all the node names + attribute names lowercase, to account for erroneous xml formatting -- leave the values alone thoughDi2015NewLine        xmlString = Regex.Replace(xmlString, @"<[^<>]+>", m => m.Value.ToLower(),RegexOptions.Multiline | RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var xmlDoc = LoadXmlDocument(xmlString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var listOfStuff = new List<Whatever>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rootNode = xmlDoc.DocumentElement;Di2015NewLine        foreach(XmlNode xmlNode in rootNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var whatever = new WhateverDi2015NewLine                               {Di2015NewLine                                   FirstName = xmlNode["first_name"].InnerText,Di2015NewLine                                   LastName = xmlNode["last_name"].InnerText,Di2015NewLine                                   SkuNumber = Convert.ToInt32(xmlNode["sku_number"].InnerText)Di2015NewLine                               };Di2015NewLine            listOfStuff.Add(whatever);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static XmlDocument LoadXmlDocument(string xmlString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //some extra stuff to account for URLEncoded strings, if necessaryDi2015NewLine        if (xmlString.IndexOf("%3e%") > -1)Di2015NewLine            xmlString = HttpUtility.UrlDecode(xmlString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        xmlString = xmlString.Replace((char)34, '\\'').Replace("&", "&").Replace("\\\\", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var xmlDocument = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        xmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace = false;Di2015NewLine        xmlDocument.LoadXml(xmlString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return xmlDocument;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15802655Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AuthorizeAttribute : FilterAttribute, IAuthorizationFilterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly RoleEnum[] _acceptedRoles;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AuthorizeAttribute(params RoleEnum[] acceptedroles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _acceptedRoles = acceptedroles;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AuthorizeAttribute(params bool[] allowAll)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (allowAll[0])Di2015NewLine            _acceptedRoles = new RoleEnum[] { RoleEnum.Admin, RoleEnum.user};Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnAuthorization(AuthorizationContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (SessionHelper.UserInSession == null)//user not logged inDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FormsAuthentication.SignOut();Di2015NewLine            filterContext.Result =Di2015NewLine                 new RedirectToRouteResult(new System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary {{ "controller", "Home" },Di2015NewLine                                             { "action", "Index" },Di2015NewLine                                             { "returnUrl",    filterContext.HttpContext.Request.RawUrl } });//send the user to login page with return urlDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!_acceptedRoles.Any(acceptedRole => SessionHelper.UserInSession.UserRoles.Any(currentRole => acceptedRole == currentRole.Role)))Di2015NewLine            //allow if any of the user roles is among accepted roles. 15812029Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int FisherYates()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int length = 10000;Di2015NewLine        int[] array = Enumerable.Range(1, length).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = length - 1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int j = random.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine            int temp = array[i];Di2015NewLine            array[i] = array[j];Di2015NewLine            array[j] = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return array[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = 10000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        int dummy = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dummy += FisherYates();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine(string.Format("{0} in {1}ms", dummy, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds));Di2015NewLine        System.Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15812404Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InheritanceBinder : DefaultModelBinderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override object BindModel(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var modelType = bindingContext.ModelType;Di2015NewLine            object model = modelType.Assembly.CreateInstance(modelType.FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var inheritedtypes = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetTypes().Where(t => model.GetType().IsAssignableFrom(t)).ToList();Di2015NewLine            HttpRequestBase req = controllerContext.HttpContext.Request;Di2015NewLine            var keys = req.Form.Keys.Cast<string>().Where(q => q != "__RequestVerificationToken").ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<KeyValuePair<Type, int>> matches = new List<KeyValuePair<Type,int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            inheritedtypes.ForEach(t => {Di2015NewLine                int p_matches = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine p_matches++;Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                matches.Add(new KeyValuePair<Type, int>(t, p_matches));Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bestmatches = matches.Where(q => q.Value == matches.Max(s => s.Value));Di2015NewLine            if (!bestmatches.Any())Di2015NewLine                throw new TargetInvocationException("Could not determine model to bind based on the form values provided", null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var usematch = bestmatches.First().Key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object bindObj = Activator.CreateInstance(usematch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bindingContext.ModelMetadata = ModelMetadataProviders.Current.GetMetadataForType(() => bindObj, usematch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return base.BindModel(controllerContext, bindingContext);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15813068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object InitializeTarget(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object target = CreateObject(type);Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo propertyInfo in type.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (propertyInfo.PropertyType.IsClass && propertyInfo.CanWriteDi2015NewLine                && propertyInfo.PropertyType != typeof(string)Di2015NewLine                && (propertyInfo.IsDefined(typeof(DataMemberAttribute), true)))Di2015NewLine                propertyInfo.SetValue(target, InitializeTarget(propertyInfo.PropertyType), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object CreateObject(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(IList).IsAssignableFrom(type) && type.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type[] genericArguments = type.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine            if (genericArguments.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var list = (IList)Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine                //Adding default valueDi2015NewLine                list.Add(CreateObject(genericArguments[0]));Di2015NewLine                return list;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //If the object is only to serialize, you can use itDi2015NewLine        return FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject(type);Di2015NewLine        //orDi2015NewLine        //            return Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

                 lastLogins[username] = lastLogOn;Di2015NewLine                                   }Di2015NewLine                               }Di2015NewLine                               elseDi2015NewLine                               {Di2015NewLine                                   lastLogins.Add(username, lastLogOn);Di2015NewLine                               }Di2015NewLine continue;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       return lastLogins;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

15814226Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void OnAssociatedObjectManipulationDelta(object sender, ManipulationDeltaRoutedEventArgs manipulationDeltaRoutedEventArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dx = manipulationDeltaRoutedEventArgs.Cumulative.Translation.X;Di2015NewLine        var dy = manipulationDeltaRoutedEventArgs.Cumulative.Translation.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var x = _startPosition.X + dx;Di2015NewLine        var y = _startPosition.Y + dy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (manipulationDeltaRoutedEventArgs.IsInertial)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (x < 0 ||Di2015NewLine                   x > _canvas.ActualWidth - 15814744Di2015UniqueSeparator["MyApp"]
15814744Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void writeCookie(string name, string value) {Di2015NewLine        if(Response.Cookies["MyApp"] == null) {Di2015NewLine            HttpCookie newCookie = new HttpCookie("MyApp");Di2015NewLine            newCookie.Expires = DateTime.Now.AddYears(1);Di2015NewLine            Response.SetCookie(newCookie);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(Response.Cookies["MyApp"][name] == null)Di2015NewLine            Response.Cookies["MyApp"].Values.Add(name, value);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            Response.Cookies["MyApp"][name] = val;Di2015NewLine       // or maybe simple                 Response.Cookies["MyApp"][name] = val; will work fine, not sure hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15816337Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (myLong >> 63 != 0) // The last bit is not 0, meaning myLong is negativeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    myLong = (myLong & (long.MaxValue >> 1)); // sets the leading bit to 0, making myLong positiveDi2015NewLine    myLong = ~myLong + 1; // flips all bits and increments by 1Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinereturn myLong;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// One-liner alternativeDi2015NewLinereturn myLong >> 63 != 0 ? 15817243Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<string>[] SomeClientBuilsenessLogicMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var serviceClient = GetServiceClientInstance(); //you might want to have single instance (single connection) of WCF service client, so I implemented it's creation as factory method here.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[][] serviceData = serviceClient.MyMethod();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<string>[] mutableDataList = serviceData.Select(x=>x.ToList()).ToArray();//Not the best memory usage here probably (better is a loop), but for not big data lists it's fine.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Perform any needed operations for list changing.
